body_html: For a test, e.g. this style transfer code https://github.com/NVIDIA/FastPhotoStyle/blob/master/photo_smooth.py#L77 batch-inverts matrices of shape HxWx3x3 in NumPy, one can compare perf of batched GPU inversion versus NumPy.
body_text: For a test, e.g. this style transfer code https://github.com/NVIDIA/FastPhotoStyle/blob/master/photo_smooth.py#L77 batch-inverts matrices of shape HxWx3x3 in NumPy, one can compare perf of batched GPU inversion versus NumPy.
body: For a test, e.g. this style transfer code https://github.com/NVIDIA/FastPhotoStyle/blob/master/photo_smooth.py#L77 batch-inverts matrices of shape HxWx3x3 in NumPy, one can compare perf of batched GPU inversion versus NumPy.
